title: Blue Book! Orange Octopus!
description: This is an alternate cover edition for B017Y52SWQ A fun and easy to read kids book! Helps kids with memorization, learning beginning sounds and practicing shapes and colors. This book is filled with descriptive words that engage young readers' minds, colorful objects that are sure to grab their attention and many fun-loving animal pictures. Blue Book Orange Octopus is a great read that many children are sure to love!
author: N.V. Smith
